page.title: 09SPORTS IN CHALFORD
page.content: The sports we play in Chalford are tennis,football,cricket,badminton and rounders.Tennis and badminton can be played with two or four players. Football is a good team-game and so is netball.There are two teams in a football match,with eleven players on each side.Netball has two teams of seven and rounders two teams of nine players.For this game you have to hit a hard ball with a narrow bat and run round a circle of posts to score a rounder.Cricket is a summer game for two teams of eleven.One bats and the other fields.The idea is to hit the ball and score runs.All these games can be played at the Chalford Sports and Social Club.We also have school competitions of football,netball and rounders when we play against other schools in the district.
